Title: Kundun
Actors: Tenzin Thuthob Tsarong, Gyurme Tethong, Tulku Jamyang Kunga Tenzin, Tenzin Yeshi Paichang
Plot: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 9 nominations.
Production: Refuge Productions Inc., Touchstone Pictures, De Fina-Cappa, Walt Disney Pictures
